ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 ounce) package seasoned coating mix (such as SHAKE-N-BAKE®)

cookingTips: Wrap sausage evenly around each egg for consistent cooking
Dip in milk before coating with seasoned mix for better adhesion
Bake at 350°F for 20-25 minutes until sausage is cooked through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These make excellent appetizers or brunch additions. Will you serve them hot or at room temperature?
